about.details:
Incorporated in 2019, Shantidoot Infra Services Limited is a specialized provider of construction services to the education, healthcare and hospitality sectors. The company is headquartered in Patna and currently operating a business in the Indian states of Bihar and Jharkhand.

Shantidoot Infra Services Limited also carry out projects of re-designing, re-modelling and renovating institutions as per the need of the clients. The company categorises the projects mainly into the government sector and the Private sector. The company secure private sector contracts, in general, through one-to-one negotiation and Government contracts through bids as per the public notice issued by government departments.

The projects undertaken by the company are the Renovation of the Kerua Pond scheme Under M.I. Division Nalanda on Block-Giriyak, Sarmera and Silao (Government projects) and Gautam Institute of Nursing, Gautam Institute of Pharmacy, Mata Sushila Institute of Education, Shantidoot Hospital, among other (Private projects).

Competitive Strengths :

  1. Experienced Management team and skilled manpower.
  2. Direct Relationship with Suppliers.
  3. Quality Assurance and Standards.
  4. Established relationship with Subcontractors.

faqs.question: What is the Shantidoot Infra Services IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shantidoot Infra Services IPO is a SME IPO of 496000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.02 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹81 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on September 6, 2022, and closes on September 9, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shantidoot Infra Services IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shantidoot Infra Services IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shantidoot Infra Services IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shantidoot Infra Services IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shantidoot Infra Services IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Shantidoot Infra Services IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Shantidoot Infra Services IPO opens on September 6, 2022 and closes on September 9, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Shantidoot Infra Services IPO?
faqs.answer: Shantidoot Infra Services IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,29,600.

faqs.question: How to apply for Shantidoot Infra Services IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Shantidoot Infra Services IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Shantidoot Infra Services IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Shantidoot Infra Services IPO will be done on Wednesday, September 14, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, September 16, 2022. Check the Shantidoot Infra Services IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Shantidoot Infra Services IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Shantidoot Infra Services IPO listing date is on Monday, September 19, 2022.
